ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Problems with Heritrix webapp finding profiles and job dir

I applied your patch Max.  Also, I think this current patch and your 
previous work on the cmd file has fixed this issue: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1436241&group_id=73833&atid=539099.  
If so, add a note to the issue confirming it is so and I'll close it.

Thanks for the contribs. Max.
Good stuff,
St.Ack

Maximilian Schï¿½fmann wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> I had some problems running the Heritrix webapp in another servlet
> container (Tomcat 5.5). The profiles directory wasn't found and the
> jobs directory was always created in TOMCAT_HOME/jobs ignoring the
> settings in heritrix.properties
> I've added a patch that addresses these issues and also a windows
> related one which wouldn't allow job directories on another drive:
> http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php? 
> <http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?>
> func=detail&aid=1587413&group_id=73833&atid=539099
>
> Regards,
> Max
